en: Love is the one thing we’re capable of perceiving that transcends time and space.
zh: 爱是唯一可以超越时间和空间的事物。

en: Murphy’s law doesn’t mean that something bad will happen. It means that whatever can happen, will happen.
zh: 墨菲定律并非指的是那些变坏的事情必会发生……而是指那些能够发生的事情，就会发生。

en: We used to look up at the sky and wonder at our place in the stars, now we just look down and worry about our place in the dirt.
zh: 我们曾经仰望星空并且期许总有一天可以登陆其他星球，但现在我们只能低头担心我们居住地的废土。

en: We need to go well beyond the boundaries of our own existence. We can’t think as individuals…
zh: 我们需要前往距离我们生存的世界极其遥远的地方，我们不可以作为一个个体来思考这个问题……

en: Cooper: Mankind was born on Earth. It was never meant to die here.
zh: 库珀：人类生在地球，但绝不应该在这里灭亡。

en: Cooper: When you become a parent, one thing becomes really clear. And that’s that you want to make sure your children feel safe.
zh: 库珀：当你为人父母了以后，你会非常清楚一件事，那就是你得确保你的孩子有安全感。

en: Dr. Brand: Not sure of what I’m more afraid of, them never coming back, or coming back to find we’ve failed.
zh: 布兰德博士：不知道我更害怕哪个，是他们不会再回来了，还是回来却发现我们失败了。

en: Do not go gentle into that good night. Old age should burn and rave at close of day. Rage, Rage against the dying light.
zh: 不要温和地走进那个良夜。白昼将尽，暮年仍应燃烧咆哮。怒斥吧，怒斥光的消逝。

en: We’ll find a way; we always have.
zh: 我们会找到办法的，我们总有办法。
